name: email-manager
description: Gmail management tool - OAuth, fetch, send, and draft emails

scripts.auth: pnpm run build && node dist/index.js auth
scripts.fetch: pnpm run build && node dist/index.js fetch
scripts.send: pnpm run build && node dist/index.js send
scripts.draft: pnpm run build && node dist/index.js draft
scripts.drafts: pnpm run build && node dist/index.js drafts
scripts.status: pnpm run build && node dist/index.js status

author: David
